put.description: The updated customer will be returned if everything succeeded, if there was any problems an error will be returned.  You need to supply the unique customer number of the customer that you want to update.  Only the properties provided in the request body will be updated, properties not provided will left unchanged.

post.description:
An endpoint for creating an invoice. While it is possible to create an
 invoice without rows, we encourage you to add them if you can.

parameters.name: lastmodified
parameters.description: Retrieves all records since the provided timestamp.

get.description: Retrieves the details of an account. You need to supply the unique account number that was returned when the account was created or retrieved from the list of accounts.

scopes.companyinformation: Read/write access to company information data
scopes.costcenter: Read/write access to cost center data
scopes.supplierinvoice: Read/write access to supplier invoice data
